title: Home | Qnan
qnan_desc: Order meals from local restaurants with fast delivery and real-time tracking.
about_us_desc: We are a team of developers who are passionate about creating innovative solutions to improve the lives of people.
contact_us_desc: We would love to hear from you. Please contact us using the form below.
services_desc: We offer a wide range of services to meet your needs.
banner-desc: DISCOVER YOUR FAVORITE LOCAL RESTAURANTS THAT NOW DELIVER
about_us-desc: We started this journey eager to provide our local community with a more convenient & efficient way of ordering online. Our intention was to bring the same online delivery experience as abroad, to our locals in the Kingdom.
about_us-footer: We aim to be the first choice when it’s time to eat! Stay tuned for more exciting ventures!
qnan_desc: Order foods from local restaurants with fast delivery and real-time tracking.
invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
invalidBusinessType: Please select a valid business type
invalidCuisineType: Please select a valid cuisine type
restaurant_details_desc: Fill in the details of the restaurant to proceed.
entrt_restaurant_desc: Enter a brief description of your restaurant
add_restaurant_title: Embark on a cooking adventure now!
add_restaurnat_desc: Join us and discover a whole new platform designed just for you! Whether you are craving delicious home-cooked food, desserts or fresh juices, Fanan app is the perfect place to showcase your talent, fill out the required questionnaire and stay in touch.
add_restaurant_sec1_title: Are you a creative chef looking for an opportunity to present your dishes to the world?
add_restaurant_sec1_desc: Our application is the perfect platform for you! Whether you are skilled at preparing the most delicious traditional, oriental, western, dessert or juice dishes, the (Qanan) application provides you with the opportunity to showcase your skills to a wide audience and achieve additional profits beyond your expectations by selling your dishes from your kitchen.
financial_gain_desc: Earn extra income from your favorite hobby and develop your own project.
wide_recognition_desc: Build a customer base and gain wide recognition in the culinary field.
direct_communication_desc: Communicate directly with customers without intermediaries.
ease_of_use_desc: Create your menu and share delicious photos with minimal effort.
continuous_support_desc: Our team is available to assist you every step of your journey with us.
